summary.span: 表示複數。

span.span: Represents a complex number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複數是包含實數和虛數部分的數字。A complex number is a number that comprises a real number part and an imaginary number part. 複數 z 通常以表單 z = x + 爨文，其中*x*並*y*是實數，和*我*是具有屬性的虛單位*i*2 =-1。A complex number z is usually written in the form z = x + yi, where *x* and *y* are real numbers, and *i* is the imaginary unit that has the property *i*2 = -1. 複數的實數部分，由*x*，而且會以表示複數的虛數部分*y*。The real part of the complex number is represented by *x*, and the imaginary part of the complex number is represented by *y*. 型別會使用笛卡兒座標系統 （real 虛） 時具現化和管理複雜的數字。The type uses the Cartesian coordinate system (real, imaginary) when instantiating and manipulating complex numbers. 複數可以表示成二維座標系統，也就是複數平面的點。A complex number can be represented as a point in a two-dimensional coordinate system, which is known as the complex plane. 複數的實數部分，位於 x 軸 （水平軸），且虛數部分位於 y 軸 （垂直軸） 上。The real part of the complex number is positioned on the x-axis (the horizontal axis), and the imaginary part is positioned on the y-axis (the vertical axis). 複平面中的任何時間點也可以使用極座標系統，根據其絕對值，來表示。Any point in the complex plane can also be expressed based on its absolute value, by using the polar coordinate system. 在極座標點的特點兩個數字：In polar coordinates, a point is characterized by two numbers: - 它的範圍，也就是從原點的點的距離 （也就是 0，0 或 x 軸和 y 軸相交的點）。Its magnitude, which is the distance of the point from the origin (that is, 0,0, or the point at which the x-axis and the y-axis intersect). - 其階段，也就是在實數軸和從原點繪製點之間的角度。Its phase, which is the angle between the real axis and the line drawn from the origin to the point. ## 具現化複數Instantiating a Complex Number 您可以指派到複數的值，以下列方式之一：You can assign a value to a complex number in one of the following ways: - 藉由傳遞兩個其建構函式的值。By passing two values to its constructor. 第一個值代表的複數，實數部分，而第二個值代表其虛數部分。The first value represents the real part of the complex number, and the second value represents its imaginary part. 這些值代表複數的二維的笛卡兒座標系統中的位置。These values represent the position of the complex number in the two-dimensional Cartesian coordinate system. - 藉由呼叫靜態 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法，以從其極座標建立複數。By calling the static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method to create a complex number from its polar coordinates. - 藉由指派， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或值物件。By assigning a , , , , , , , , , or value to a object. 值會變成複數，實數部分，其虛數部分等於 0。The value becomes the real part of the complex number, and its imaginary part equals 0. - （在 C# 中) 轉型或轉換 （在 Visual Basic)或是值物件。By casting (in C#) or converting (in Visual Basic) a or value to a object. 值會變成複數，實數部分，其虛數部分等於 0。The value becomes the real part of the complex number, and its imaginary part equals 0. - 藉由指定的方法或運算子所傳回的複數物件。By assigning the complex number that is returned by a method or operator to a object. 例如，是傳回加總的兩個複數，複數的靜態方法和運算子兩個複數相加，並傳回結果。For example, is a static method that returns a complex number that is the sum of two complex numbers, and the operator adds two complex numbers and returns the result. 下列範例會示範每個指派值到複數的五種。The following example demonstrates each of these five ways of assigning a value to a complex number. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/cs/create1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/vb/create1.vb#2)] ## 複雜數字的作業Operations with Complex Numbers .NET Framework 中的結構包含成員，可以提供下列功能：The structure in the .NET Framework includes members that provide the following functionality: - 比較兩個複數相加，以判斷它們是否相等的方法。Methods to compare two complex numbers to determine whether they are equal. - 若要執行複數算術運算的運算子。Operators to perform arithmetic operations on complex numbers. 運算子可讓您能夠執行加法、 減法、 乘法、 除法和複雜數字的一元否定運算。 operators enable you to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and unary negation with complex numbers. - 執行複雜的數字其他數值作業的方法。Methods to perform other numerical operations on complex numbers. 除了四個基本的算術運算，您可以引發指定的乘冪的複數，找出的平方根的複數，並取得複數的絕對值。In addition to the four basic arithmetic operations, you can raise a complex number to a specified power, find the square root of a complex number, and get the absolute value of a complex number. - 執行三角運算複雜數字上的方法。Methods to perform trigonometric operations on complex numbers. 例如，您可以計算角度表示複數的正切函數。For example, you can calculate the tangent of an angle represented by a complex number. 請注意，因為並屬性是唯讀，您無法修改的現有值物件。Note that, because the and properties are read-only, you cannot modify the value of an existing object. 執行作業的所有方法數字，其傳回的值屬於類型，傳回新數目。All methods that perform an operation on a number, if their return value is of type , return a new number. ## 有效位數和複數Precision and Complex Numbers 兩個雙精確度浮點值來表示複數的實數和虛數部分。The real and imaginary parts of a complex number are represented by two double-precision floating-point values. 這表示值，例如雙精度浮點數值，可能會遺失有效位數數值作業的結果。This means that values, like double-precision floating-point values, can lose precision as a result of numerical operations. 這表示，嚴格相等的兩個比較值可能會失敗，即使兩個值之間的差異是因為遺失有效位數。This means that strict comparisons for equality of two values may fail, even if the difference between the two values is due to a loss of precision. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 例如，執行乘上數字的對數，應該傳回原始的數字。For example, performing exponentiation on the logarithm of a number should return the original number. 不過，在某些情況下，浮點值的精確度遺失的可能造成些微的差異，兩個值，如下列範例所示。However, in some cases, the loss of precision of floating-point values can cause slight differences between the two values, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/cs/precision1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/vb/precision1.vb#5)] 同樣地，下列範例中，它會計算平方根數字，則會產生稍微不同的結果，在 32 位元和 IA64 版本的.NET Framework。Similarly, the following example, which calculates the square root of a number, produces slightly different results on the 32-bit and IA64 versions of the .NET Framework. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/cs/precision1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/vb/precision1.vb#6)] ## 複雜數字、 無限大和 NaNComplex Numbers, Infinity, and NaN 複數的實數和虛數部分都由值。The real and imaginary parts of a complex number are represented by values. 除了舉凡要，複數的實數或虛數部分可以有值為， ，或。In addition to ranging from to , the real or imaginary part of a complex number can have a value of , , or . ，和所有傳播任何算術或三角作業中。, , and all propagate in any arithmetic or trigonometric operation. 在下列範例中，除以會產生複數的實數和虛數部分都。In the following example, division by produces a complex number whose real and imaginary parts are both . 如此一來，執行乘法，這個值也會產生複數的實數和虛數部分。As a result, performing multiplication with this value also produces a complex number whose real and imaginary parts are . 同樣地，執行的範圍溢位的乘法所產生類型的複數的實數部分，而其虛數部分是。Similarly, performing a multiplication that overflows the range of the type produces a complex number whose real part is and whose imaginary part is . 後續執行與這個複數的部門會傳回複數的實數部分，而其虛數部分是。Subsequently performing division with this complex number returns a complex number whose real part is and whose imaginary part is . [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/cs/nan1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/vb/nan1.vb#3)] 使用複雜的數值無效，或，時發生溢位的數學運算資料型別並不會擲回例外狀況。Mathematical operations with complex numbers that are invalid or that overflow the range of the data type do not throw an exception. 相反地，它們會傳回， ，或在下列情況下：Instead, they return a , , or under the following conditions: - 由零傳回正數的劃分。The division of a positive number by zero returns . - 超出上限的任何作業資料類型會傳回。Any operation that overflows the upper bound of the data type returns . - 零個傳回的負數的除法。The division of a negative number by zero returns . - 任何作業，就會溢位的下限資料類型會傳回。Any operation that overflows the lower bound of the data type returns . - 為零的零部門傳回。The division of a zero by zero returns . - 其值的運算元執行任何作業， ，或會傳回， ，或，取決於特定的作業。Any operation that is performed on operands whose values are , , or returns , , or , depending on the specific operation. 請注意，這適用於方法所執行的任何中繼計算。Note that this applies to any intermediate calculations performed by a method. 例如的乘法`new Complex(9e308, 9e308) and new Complex(2.5, 3.5)`會使用公式 (ac-bd) + （ad + bc） 我。For example, the multiplication of `new Complex(9e308, 9e308) and new Complex(2.5, 3.5)` uses the formula (ac - bd) + (ad + bc)i. 相乘得出的實數部分的計算會評估運算式 9e308 \* 2.5-9e308 \* 3.5。The calculation of the real component that results from the multiplication evaluates the expression 9e308 \* 2.5 - 9e308 \* 3.5. 傳回此運算式中的每個中繼乘法，並嘗試減去從傳回。Each intermediate multiplication in this expression returns , and the attempt to subtract from returns . ## 複雜數字格式化Formatting a Complex Number 根據預設，複合的數字的字串表示會在表單`(`*實際*`,` *虛數*`)`，其中*實際*和*假想*是的字串表示法形成複數的實數和虛數元件的值。By default, the string representation of a complex number takes the form `(`*real*`,` *imaginary*`)`, where *real* and *imaginary* are the string representations of the values that form the complex number's real and imaginary components. 一些多載方法允許自訂的字串表示，其中以反映特定文化特性的格式化慣例，或出現在標準或自訂的數字所定義的特定格式的值格式字串。Some overloads of the method allow customization of the string representations of these values to reflect the formatting conventions of a particular culture or to appear in a particular format defined by a standard or custom numeric format string. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)(For more information, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) 其中一種較常見的方式表達的複雜數字的字串表示的形式 a + bi，其中是複數的實數部分，而 b 是複數的虛數部分。One of the more common ways of expressing the string representation of a complex number takes the form a + bi, where a is the complex number's real component, and b is the complex number's imaginary component. 電機理學士複數最常以 + bj。In electrical engineering, a complex number is most commonly expressed as a + bj. 您可以使用這兩種形式其中一種方法來傳回複數的字串表示。You can return the string representation of a complex number in either of these two forms. 若要這樣做，請藉由實作中定義自訂的格式提供者並介面，然後再呼叫方法。To do this, define a custom format provider by implementing the and interfaces, and then call the method. 下列範例會定義`ComplexFormatter`類別，做為字串的形式表示複數 a + bi 或 + bj。The following example defines a `ComplexFormatter` class that represents a complex number as a string in the form of either a + bi or a + bj. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/cs/customfmt1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.class/vb/customfmt1.vb#1)] 然後，下列範例會顯示 複雜數字的字串表示使用此自訂格式器。The following example then uses this custom formatter to display the string representation of a complex number. remarks.format: ## Remarks 複數的絕對值就相當於其屬性。The absolute value of a complex number is equivalent to its property. 實際數字的絕對值 + bi 的計算方式如下：The absolute value of a real number a + bi is calculated as follows: - 如果 b = 0，則結果為 0。If b = 0, the result is 0. - 如果 > b，結果會是 \*(1 + b2/a2)。If a > b, the result is a \*(1 + b2/a2). - 如果 b >，則結果是 b \* (1 + a2b2)。If b > a, the result is b \* (1 + a2/b2). 如果計算的絕對值會產生溢位，此方法會傳回其中一個或。If the calculation of the absolute value results in an overflow, the method returns either or . 如果有任一或屬性是和其他屬性既不是也，則方法會傳回。If either the or property is and the other property is neither nor , the method returns . ## Examples 下列範例會計算複數的絕對值，並示範它就相當於 windows 7屬性。The following example calculates the absolute value of a complex number and demonstrates that it is equivalent to the value of the property. para.span: 使用方法小心，因為兩個值，相當明顯可以視為不相等，因為它們的實數和虛數元件的不同有效位數。

span.span: Use the method with caution, because two values that are apparently equivalent can be considered unequal due to the differing precision of their real and imaginary components.
The following example reports that (3.33333, 0.142857) and (10/3, 1/7) are not equal.

[!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.Equals#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.equals/cs/precision1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.Equals#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.equals/vb/precision1.vb#4)]

para.span: 建議的技巧是要定義可接受的界的兩個值之間的差異 (例如。 其中一個值的實數和虛數元件的 01%) 而不是比較是否相等的值。

span.span: One recommended technique is to define an acceptable margin of difference between the two values (such as .01% of one of the values' real and imaginary components) instead of comparing the values for equality.

para.span: 如果兩個值之間差異的絕對值是小於或等於該邊界，差異是有可能是因為有不同的有效位數，而且，因此，值為可能會相等。

span.span: If the absolute value of the difference between the two values is less than or equal to that margin, the difference is likely to be due to a difference in precision, and, therefore, the values are likely to be equal.

para.span: 下列範例會使用這項技術，來比較兩個先前的程式碼範例，請參閱元的複雜值。

span.span: The following example uses this technique to compare the two complex values that the previous code example found to be unequal.

para.span: 它會尋找兩個複數相加，才會相等。

span.span: It finds the two complex numbers to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性就相當於複數的絕對值。The property is equivalent to the absolute value of a complex number. 它會指定從原點 （x 軸和 y 軸笛卡兒座標系統中的交集處） 之間的距離來表示複數的二維點。It specifies the distance from the origin (the intersection of the x-axis and the y-axis in the Cartesian coordinate system) to the two-dimensional point represented by a complex number. 絕對值的計算方式如下：The absolute value is calculated as follows: | a + bi | = (a \* a + b \* b)| a + bi | = (a \* a + b \* b) 如果計算的絕對值會產生溢位，這個屬性會傳回或。If the calculation of the absolute value results in an overflow, this property returns either or . 而屬性會定義一個代表複數的極座標系統中的點的位置。The and the properties define the position of a point that represents a complex number in the polar coordinate system. 您可以具現化呼叫，根據其極座標，而不是笛卡兒座標的複數方法。You can instantiate a complex number based on its polar coordinates instead of its Cartesian coordinates by calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例會計算複數的絕對值，並示範它就相當於 windows 7屬性。The following example calculates the absolute value of a complex number and demonstrates that it is equivalent to the value of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 明確轉換運算子定義可以轉換成的型別物件。Explicit conversion operators define types that can be converted to a object. 語言編譯器不會執行這項轉換會自動因為它可能會遺失資料。Language compilers do not perform this conversion automatically because it can involve data loss. 相反地，它們執行轉換 （在 C# 中) 轉型運算子或轉換函式時，才可以 (例如`CType`Visual Basic 中) 使用。Instead, they perform the conversion only if a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (such as `CType` in Visual Basic) is used. 否則，它們會顯示編譯器錯誤。Otherwise, they display a compiler error. 轉換值到複數的實數部分，可能會導致失去精確度因為，這是複雜的數種屬性，具有較少的有效位數比。The conversion of a value to the real part of a complex number can result in a loss of precision because a , which is the type of the complex number's property, has fewer significant digits than a . ## Examples 下列範例說明的明確轉換值來值。The following example illustrates the explicit conversion of values to values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 明確轉換運算子定義可以轉換成的型別物件。Explicit conversion operators define types that can be converted to a object. 語言編譯器不會執行這項轉換會自動因為它可能會遺失資料。Language compilers do not perform this conversion automatically because it can involve data loss. 相反地，它們執行轉換 （在 C# 中) 轉型運算子或轉換函式時，才可以 (例如`CType`Visual Basic 中) 使用。Instead, they perform the conversion only if a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (such as `CType` in Visual Basic) is used. 否則，它們會顯示編譯器錯誤。Otherwise, they display a compiler error. 轉換值到複數的實數部分，可能會導致失去精確度因為，這是複雜的數種屬性，具有較少的有效位數比。The conversion of a value to the real part of a complex number can result in a loss of precision because a , which is the type of the complex number's property, has fewer significant digits than a . 如果轉換成功，則因為的值超出範圍型別，此作業不會擲回。If the conversion is unsuccessful because the value is out of the range of the type, the operation does not throw an . 相反地，如果`value`是小於，結果是具有複數屬性值等於。Instead, if `value` is less than , the result is a complex number that has a property value equal to . 如果`value`大於，結果是具有複數屬性值等於。If `value` is greater than , the result is a complex number that has a property value equal to . ## Examples 下列範例說明的明確轉換值來值。The following example illustrates the explicit conversion of values to values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載運算子定義的類型的編譯器可以自動轉換而不需要明確轉型運算子 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的轉換函式呼叫的物件。The overloads of the operator define the types from which a compiler can automatically convert a object without an explicit casting operator (in C#) or a call to a conversion function (in Visual Basic). 它們擴展轉換不會涉及資料遺失，並不會擲回。They are widening conversions that do not involve data loss and do not throw an . 這個多載可讓編譯器處理從不複數，如下列範例所示的值。This overload lets the compiler handle conversions from a value to a complex number, as the following example shows. 請注意，轉換的結果會是複數的實數部分等於值和其虛數部分等於零。Note that the result of the conversion is a complex number whose real part is equal to the value and whose imaginary part is equal to zero. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來定義複雜的數字不等比較運算子的作業。The method defines the operation of the inequality operator for complex numbers. 它可讓程式碼，如下所示：It enables code such as the following: [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.Inequality#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.inequality/cs/inequality1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.Inequality#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.inequality/vb/inequality1.vb#1)] 不支援自訂運算子的語言可以測試是否不相等，藉由呼叫方法，並反轉其值。Languages that do not support custom operators can test for inequality by calling the method and reversing its value. 請注意，有效位數的差異，因為兩個複數相加，顯然相當可以視為不相等。Note that, because of differences in precision, two complex numbers that are apparently equivalent can be considered unequal. 一個可能的解決方法是實作傳回的比較方法`true`複雜數字的兩個實數和虛數部分之間的差異超過特定臨界值時，才 (例如。 01%的真實或假想元件的值其中一個複雜的數字）。One possible workaround is to implement a comparison method that returns `true` only if the difference between the two real and imaginary parts of the complex numbers exceeds a certain threshold (such as .01% of the value of the real or imaginary component of one of the complex numbers). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為複數 + bi，階段會計算為(b)。For a complex number a + bi, the phase is computed as (b, a). 您可以識別複數，複數平面上笛卡兒座標或其極座標。You can identify a complex number by its Cartesian coordinates on the complex plane or by its polar coordinates. 複數的階段 （引數） 是在實數軸從原點 （x 軸和 y 軸交集） 所畫之線條的角度來代表複數的指標。The phase (argument) of a complex number is the angle to the real axis of a line drawn from the point of origin (the intersection of the x-axis and the y-axis) to the point represented by the complex number. 大小 (以屬性) 是從原點到複數表示的點的距離。The magnitude (represented by the property) is the distance from the point of origin to the point that is represented by the complex number. 您可以具現化呼叫，根據其極座標，而不是笛卡兒座標的複數方法。You can instantiate a complex number based on its polar coordinates instead of its Cartesian coordinates by calling the method. 若要將階段從弧度轉換為度，將它乘以 180 /。To convert the phase from radians to degrees, multiply it by 180/. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法具現化複數根據極座標，，，然後顯示的值及其和屬性。The following example uses the method to instantiate a complex number based on its polar coordinates, and then displays the value of its and properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 複數的預設字串表示會顯示在表單中使用其笛卡兒座標數字`(` `,` *b*`)`，其中是實數部分的複數，並*b*是其虛數部分。The default string representation of a complex number displays the number using its Cartesian coordinates in the form `(`*a*`,` *b*`)`, where *a* is the real part of the complex number, and *b* is its imaginary part. 兩者並*b*使用一般格式規範 ("G") 和目前的系統文化特性的慣例格式化。Both *a* and *b* are formatted using the general format specifier ("G") and the conventions of the current system culture. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示數個複雜的數字的字串表示。The following example displays the string representation of several complex numbers. 輸出會使用英文-美國 ("EN-US") 文化特性，在此情況下，這是目前系統文化特性的格式化慣例。The output uses the formatting conventions of the English - United States ("en-US") culture, which, in this case, is the current system culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的複雜數字的字串表示會顯示使用笛卡兒座標格式數字`(` `,` *b*`)`，何處是實數部分的複數，並*b*是其虛數部分。The string representation of the complex number returned by this method displays the number using its Cartesian coordinates in the form `(`*a*`,` *b*`)`, where *a* is the real part of the complex number, and *b* is its imaginary part. 兩者並*b*使用一般格式規範 ("G") 和所定義的文化特性的慣例格式化`provider`。Both *a* and *b* are formatted using the general format specifier ("G") and the conventions of the culture defined by `provider`. `provider`參數是實作。The `provider` parameter is an implementation. 其方法會傳回提供特定文化特性格式資訊的實數和虛數字，傳回的字串中的物件。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the real and imaginary numbers in the returned string. 如果`provider`已`null`，傳回的字串會使用格式化目前文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the returned string is formatted using the object of the current culture. `provider`參數可以是下列其中之一：The `provider` parameter can be one of the following: - A物件，表示提供的格式資訊的文化特性A object that represents the culture that supplies formatting information - 物件，提供格式設定資訊。The object that supplies formatting information. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供的格式資訊的物件。Its method returns the object that supplies formatting information. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示數個複雜的數字的字串表示。The following example displays the string representation of several complex numbers. 結果會使用英文-美國 ("EN-US") 和法文-法國 ("FR-FR") 文化特性的格式化慣例。The result uses the formatting conventions of the English - United States ("en-US") and French - France ("fr-FR") cultures. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的複雜數字的字串表示會顯示使用笛卡兒座標格式數字`(` `,` *b*`)`，何處是實數部分的複數，並*b*是其虛數部分。The string representation of the complex number returned by this method displays the number using its Cartesian coordinates in the form `(`*a*`,` *b*`)`, where *a* is the real part of the complex number, and *b* is its imaginary part. 兩者並*b*會使用所指定的格式字串格式化`format`。Both *a* and *b* are formatted using the format string specified by `format`. `format`參數可以是任何有效的標準數值格式規範或自訂數值格式規範的任何組合。The `format` parameter can be any valid standard numeric format specifier, or any combination of custom numeric format specifiers. 如果`format`等於或是`null`，複數的實數和虛數部分會以一般格式規範格式化 ("G")。If `format` is equal to or is `null`, the real and imaginary parts of the complex number are formatted with the general format specifier ("G"). 如果`format`是任何其他值，則方法會擲回。If `format` is any other value, the method throws a . .NET Framework 會提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following topics: - 如需有關數值格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format strings, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需.NET Framework 中的格式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 傳回字串的格式取決於目前的文化特性的物件。The format of the returned string is determined by the object for the current culture. 取決於`format`參數，這個物件可控制例如負號、 群組分隔符號和小數點符號，輸出字串中的符號。Depending on the `format` parameter, this object controls symbols such as the negative sign, the group separator, and the decimal point symbol in the output string. 若要提供目前的文化特性以外的文化特性格式資訊，請呼叫多載。To provide formatting information for cultures other than the current culture, call the overload. ## Examples 下列範例會初始化複數，並顯示它使用數個標準格式字串。The following example initializes a complex number and displays it using several standard format strings. [!code-csharp[System.Numerics.Complex.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.tostring/cs/tostring3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Numerics.Complex.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.numerics.complex.tostring/vb/tostring3.vb#3)]
